items.name: use_default_db
items.title: Database Location
items.tooltip: This option determines if the queries executed should be executed on the current Joomla database or an external database

items.name: db_host
items.title: Host Name
items.tooltip: Enter the host name to your database. If you are connecting to a local database, it should be set to localhost or 127.0.0.1

items.name: db_name
items.title: Database Name
items.tooltip: Enter the name of your database. It is case sensitive and should be a valid database

items.name: db_username
items.title: Username
items.tooltip: Your database username used to connect to the database

items.name: db_password
items.title: Password
items.tooltip: Your database password used to connect to the database

items.name: table_prefix
items.title: Table Prefix
items.tooltip: If your database tables has a custom prefix, you may enter the prefix here.
